flawed_nl_solution:
There will be 3500 gold coins / 5 chest= <<3500/5=700>>700 gold coins in every chest.
So, there will be 500 silver coins / 5 chests = <<500/5=1000>>1000 silver coins in each chest.
Then, the number of bronze coins is double the number of silver coins, so there are 2 * 500 = <<2*500=1000>>1000 bronze coins.
So there will be 1000 bronze coins / 5 chests = <<1000/5=200>>200 bronze coins in each chest.
Finally, the total number of coins in every chest will be 700 gold coins + 1000 silver coins + 200 bronze coins = <<700+1000+200=1900>>1900 coins.
#### 1900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
